Pore/Structural Features.Pore Size: 0.78 nm (major pore size distribution), 3.9 nm (initial COF pore size)

Other Information.Test Conditions: Equimolar He/N2 and He/CH4 mixtures, 50 mL min-1 total inlet flow rate, 1 bar pressure
Other Information.Additional Info: Helium permeance reached 1500 GPU with selectivities of 3.89 for He/N2 and 5.38 for He/CH4.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Equimolar He/N2 mixture, 50 mL min-1 total inlet flow rate, 1 bar pressure
Other Information.Additional Info: Nitrogen permeance was 392 GPU with a selectivity of 3.89 for He/N2.

Other Information.Test Conditions: Equimolar He/CH4 mixture, 50 mL min-1 total inlet flow rate, 1 bar pressure
Other Information.Additional Info: Methane permeance was 291 GPU with a selectivity of 5.38 for He/CH4.

Sieving Mechanism: Size exclusion at sub-nanometer scale within ultramicropores of ZIF-67 embedded in the nanopores of TAPB-BPDA

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: He/N2 selectivity: 3.89, He/CH4 selectivity: 5.38, Helium permeance: 1500 GPU

Other Information.Additional Info: The membrane demonstrated stability over 100 hours of continuous gas separation testing.
